Name: The Periphery
Details: The area of space just outside the Inner Sphere is known as the Periphery.  Generally speaking, the Periphery is in a radius roughly 450-500 light years from Terra.  Within the Periphery there is a mix of independent worlds, minor nations, minor Houses and bandit kingdoms.  The most well known are the three Minor Houses that rule the Magistracy of Canopus (House Centrella), the Outworlds Alliance (House Avellar) and the Taurian Concordat (House Calderon).
